posts.post_content: The card is red. Card color is based on it's CMC not it'd border color. If a Dark Ritual was misprinted with a green border but still had black mana symbols it'd still be a black card.

posts.post_content: It's not[Fireball](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Fireball). Fireball divides X amongst its multiple targets, this will always deal X damage, regardless of if it's hitting one or six targets.
